p: We enrolled patients presenting with an acute febrile illness of 2–7 days duration with symptoms of dengue like muscle and joints pain, nausea, rashes, etc. as mentioned in Table 2 and as suggested by attending physician. Patients were excluded if they were positive for human immunodeficiency virus, aged <5 years or pregnant. The attending physician made the diagnosis and recorded the patient’s demographic and clinicopathological information.
